__e: Grab tools, containers for sand, anything you have.
I don't know if this is your girlfriend or not, but she's the one that drove over my trash cans, which, by the way, would be a great place to put your candy wrappers.
Put plenty of ice around the container until we get back to the prison.
It would be so much less of a headache... if we could ship her in her storage unit with our stuff.
We take turns to fetch it from the kitchen of the clinic. We are also entitled to take home our supper in a special container.
You should take the bucket into the kitchen the next time.
